wikipedia_page.main: Lieutenant-General Sir John Grey  (baptised 18 March 1782 – 19 February 1856) was an officer of British Army and the East India Company forces, and was the Commander-in-chief of the Bombay Army from 30 December 1850 to 22 November 1852.

response: *1849 General Sir John Grey
